text: Allahu Akbar (Arabic: ) is an Islamic phrase, called Takbir in Arabic, meaning "God is greater" or "God is [the] greatest". Allahu Akbar or Allahu Ekber and similar variants may also refer to: * Allahu Akbar (anthem), the national anthem of Libya from 1969 to 2011 * Allahu Akbar (film), a 1977 Indian Malayalam film * "Allahu Akbar" (Lounès Matoub song), a song written by Lounès Matoub * Allahüekber Dağları, a range of mountains in northeast Turkey. In 1914 it was astride the border between Turkey and Russia. * Allah-o Akbar Rural District, an administrative subdivision of Iran * "Allah U Akbar", a song by Brand Nubian from their 1993 album In God We Trust ==See also== *Akbar (disambiguation)
title: Allahu Akbar (disambiguation)
